subject: One button not returning
description_text:
Hey there I just received  order SSN2959.
One of the buttons is not returning and is stuck.
I’m happy to fix it myself if you send me a replacement.


Thanks Max Vogt

conversations.body_text: Hi Maximilian - Gordon Vogt,    This is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045985624788

That was quick thank you, I was going to ask if it’s possible to send me 5
green led buttons. I like to swap em all out for green to match my pit.

Also, is it possible to utilise the rotary push function? It’s not wired up
right now, wondering if there are free inputs on your pcb?

Thank you!

On Wed, 22 Oct 2025 at 08:28, service@simsonn.com

Hi Maximilian - Gordon Vogt,  Sure, we can send you 6 green LED buttons as replacements. Regarding the rotary push function — it’s currently not in use because the total number of buttons has already reached the Windows limit of 40 inputs. Please provide your contact name, phone number, and shipping address, and we’ll arrange the shipment for you right away.

That's great, thank you very much.

Maximilian-Gordon Vogt
0 Stowe Road, ZERO Stowe Road
W12 8BN
London
GB



On Thu, 23 Oct 2025 at 11:44, service@simsonn.com

Please let me know when you got a new tracking link.

On Thu, 23 Oct 2025 at 13:30, Maximilian - Gordon Vogt <neok23@gmail.com>
wrote:

Hi Maximilian - Gordon Vogt,    We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Here is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045994902155
